about.title: About us
about.text: This is the German About page.

guestbook-new.intro-text: Before you move on, let us know you were here. Leave us a few words, a feeling, a question. What does it mean to you to be in a space in between? This entry is part of the exhibition. Your traces make it real, too.

imprint.concept-content:
Students of the Master’s degree program MultiMediaArt (Audio, Film, Producing) 
 and the RAVE Master’s Program 
 Salzburg University of Applied Sciences
imprint.legalInfo-content:
This exhibition is a non-commercial student project as part of the academic program at the Salzburg University of Applied Sciences.
 The respective project leads are responsible for the content of the exhibition and accompanying information.
imprint.disclaimer-content: Despite careful content control, we assume no liability for external links. The operators of the linked pages are solely responsible for their content.
imprint.copyright-content: All works and texts shown are protected by copyright. Any use, reproduction, or publication outside the scope of the exhibition requires the permission of the respective authors.
